__e: From what I hear, we couldn't have managed without you. Thank you.
I'm sure the girls would have done just fine without me their a good group.
Not single-handedly, but I like to think they couldn't have done it without me.
Not everyone would, I respect you for it,
Also just the whole, not telling thing, just wanted to say I appreciate that... because you didn't have to do it, a lot of people wouldn't have done it.
But--but if I didn't do it, they--they'djust get someone else to, andthenthey'dbe suspicious of me, so... soI saidyes. ButI didit for you.
But just because that happens, it doesn't mean they wouldn't have said it if they could have.
I mean, i have dreamt of my first "I love you"- when the guy would say it, who would it be?
I had nowhere else to go. And I couldn't tell anyone I was living here
I took an oath then he'd never be taken from me again. But slowly, he just...
I thought it wouldn't matter what we said to the judge because I thought they would never let her out.
But my parents would never let him go without finishing school.
They also said they would kill her if I went to the police.
I got a call, that if I didn't show up at the docks at midnight, they'd kill her.
Then they told me they'd kill her if I called you, but I already had.
Oh, I'm heartily sorry you're still Prime Minister, but I'm not downhearted.
"I am not gonna do that any more..." he stands to get murdered.
He was going to jail or going to get killed. So we make a plan.
